name: Hanging Gardens
quote: 'I think that if ever a mortal heard the word of God it would be in a garden at the cool of the day.' - F. Frankfort Moore

name: The Pyramids
quote: 'O, let not the pains of death which come upon thee enter into my body. I am the god Tem, and I am the foremost part of the sky, and the power which protecteth me is that which is with all the gods forever.' - The Book of the Dead, translated by Sir Ernest Alfred Wallis Budge

name: Statue of Zeus
quote: 'He spoke, the son of Kronos, and nodded his head with the dark brows, and the immortally anointed hair of the great god swept from his divine head, and all Olympos was shaken' - The Iliad

name: Monastery

[+1 Culture, +1 Faith] from [Incense] tiles [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: The most iconic music from the platine nation, this romantic and dramatic dances, played mainly by the accordion or piano. Birthed in the Golden Age, its characteristic moves make it the emblem of Argentina.

name: Folkloric Comparse
uniques: Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities

civilopediaText.text: A complete carnival composed of many ethnicities celebrating and enjoying together under one banner, the Bolivian nation.
The most folkloric of the musical genres of Brazil is danced and spectated in these paths. Full of dances, decorated wagons, choreographed shows and loud music, it is truly a spectacle.

These offices offered job and asylum to workers from all over the world who came to the driest desert to extract the valuable Nitratine. On the Atacama Desert, these posts were pivotal for the economy of whom controlled it, very important.

name: Coffee Axis
uniques: Creates a [Coffee Hacienda] improvement on a specific tile
[+1 Production, +1 Culture, +1 Gold] from [Coffee Hacienda] tiles [in this city]
The Hacienda Cannot be build on Desert, Tundra nor Snow, only at Grassland/Plains Hills
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: Located in the mountains, the long-lasting culture of Coffee plantation has made the people there experts on the matter. Here is where the magic happens, where Colombia gets the best quality of Coffee in the world.
Pioneers on the ecotourism buisness, added with the Costa Rican landscapes and Caribbean shores, makes of them a great destiny for holiday vacation.

name: Pharmaceutical Clinic
uniques: All newly-trained [relevant] units [in this city] receive the [Medic] promotion

civilopediaText.text: Attracting many foreigners and exporting doctors and medicine overseas, Cuban medicines are highly valued around the world.

name: Main Square
uniques: [+1 Culture] from [Hill] tiles [in this city] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [City center] tiles>
[+1 Science] from [Hill] tiles [in this city] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [City center] tiles> <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Mountain] tiles> <after discovering [Flight]>
Cost increases by [20] per owned city

civilopediaText.text: The classical main squares of Ecuador, dating back to the pre-colonial times, are between the best conserved of all Hispanic America, with over 300 years of existence, these plazas are a magnificent piece of history alive.

name: Public Veterinary
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Culture] from [Pasture] tiles [in this city]
Cost increases by [50] per owned city

civilopediaText.text: One of the best animal healthcare program of all has allowed the pets of the people to be a lot happier, and their owners too.
The vetiver plant growing has been mastered in the Haitian domains, leading it to be the top exporter of its oils, which are used for western cosmetics.

name: Chapultepec Castle
uniques: New [Military] units start with [10] Experience [in this city]
Provides a [Castle] in your first [4] cities for free

civilopediaText.text: The patriotic castle on the Mexican capital, is a symbol of power and national pride, as it was quite literally the last bastion of patriotic resistance against the aggressors of the north. The impressive architecture and its privileged position make it a wonder of Mexico.

name: The Panama Canal
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Science, +4 Gold] from every [Panama Canal]
[+1 Production, +1 Gold, +1 Food] from [Water] tiles [in all cities] <in cities with a [Harbor]>
Creates a [Panama Canal] improvement on a specific tile

civilopediaText.text: Arguably the most important canals on the planet, located at the isthmus of Panama, this impressive works manage to transport ships from ocean to ocean, elevating them over 20 meters and then bringing them down to the other side, saving you from 10,000 miles of sea travel.

name: Criollo Cannon
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: This valiant gunners fought with 'tooth and nail' to defend their fatherland from 3 antagonist nations at the same time, managing impressive victories that give the people pride.

name: Jesuit Hacienda
uniques: [+10]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: These Haciendas were formed by migrating Jesuits, and they were one of the reasons for the native people of Paraguay, the Guaranís, remained strong and gave Paraguay its culture, so much so, that the Guaraní is almost as much spoken as Spanish.
The globally famous Peruvian cuisine, dating back to Incan times, is the shiny jewel of Quechua dishes. Featuring the Cuy and the Ceviche, Peruvian food is to admire.
